import React,{useState}from'react';import Input from'../common/Input';import Button from'../common/Button';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FilingAssistant=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',pan:'',financialYear:'',income:'',deductions:''});const handleInputChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prevState=>({...prevState,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();// Logic to handle form submission
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 bg-white shadow-md rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Filing Assistant"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-2 gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{name:"name",label:"Name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleInputChange,placeholder:"Enter your name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{name:"pan",label:"PAN",value:formData.pan,onChange:handleInputChange,placeholder:"Enter your PAN"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{name:"financialYear",label:"Financial Year",value:formData.financialYear,onChange:handleInputChange,placeholder:"Enter financial year"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{name:"income",label:"Income",value:formData.income,onChange:handleInputChange,placeholder:"Enter your income"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{name:"deductions",label:"Deductions",value:formData.deductions,onChange:handleInputChange,placeholder:"Enter deductions"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"mt-4 w-full",type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]})]});};export default FilingAssistant;
